headline: Is Edison International (EIX) Quietly Rewriting Its Capital Structure Playbook With These 2026 Redemptions?
summary: Edison International recently announced it will redeem all outstanding 5.375% Fixed-Rate Reset Cumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock, Series A, on March 9, 2026, at US$1,000 per share, while Southern California Edison will redeem its Series K Preference Stock and trigger redemption of related 5.45% Trust Preference Securities on March 15, 2026, at US$25 per security plus accrued distributions. These coordinated preferred and trust security redemptions highlight a purposeful reshaping of the...
